comments.author: Weris.5248
comments.body:
New version of the live maps page with 4 new tabs : one for each map (EB, Green, Blue and red map).
On these tabs, the events logs display only logs related to the corresponding map :

http://mos.millenium.org/eu/matchups/map/685/eb?lang=en

comments.author: MRA.4758
comments.body:
Thanks to both MoS and ANet for their effort on this. This service is awesome.

~MRA

comments.author: Weris.5248
comments.body:
The MoS matchups tools has improved and now use this new API to display live scores and maps :

http://mos.millenium.org.

Thank you Cliff for this stuff.
